isimuggadāyaka： isimuggadāyaka（ti）
ဣသိမုဂ္ဂဒါယက（တိ）
«isimugga+dāyaka»
[ဣသိမုဂ္ဂ+ဒါယက]

Isimuggadāyaka：A Thera．He gave isimugga mixed with honey to Padumuttara Buddha and 108，000 monks．

As a result，forty-four kappas ago he was born thirty-eight times as king，his name being Mahisamanta．Ap．i．193-4．

isimuggadāyaka：ဣသိမုဂ္ဂဒါယက（တိ）
[ဣသိမုဂ္ဂ+ဒါယက]
ရသေ့စား ပဲနောက်ကို ပေးလှူတတ်သော သူ။
